posts.name: Helen's Restaurant
posts.note: From the Helen's Restaurant website, 'Generations of Down East Maine families and travelers have chosen Helen's Restaurant as a favored destination for over 60 years! Our restaurant menu has evolved to include our signature sandwiches and creative menu specials in addition to the favorite Down East fare. Specials change daily, so; please ask your server for today's list. Oh! And please remember to save room for dessert!' Helen Rosner recommends ordering the blueberry pie.

posts.name: Nosh Kitchen Bar
posts.note: Nosh Kitchen Bar is an upscale pub serving creative, jumbo-size burgers, sandwiches, and other comfort eats till late. Order the Mac and stack burger or the chicken as a bun burger.
